strings.string: For HTTPS client certificate authentication use local certificate and passphrase options.
Response will be stored in global session vars.They can be printed using keywords as below.
The test will be based on the request content in the "SOAP Request Message" below
Asset based and Globals keywords can be used. Asset based keywords will be replaced with respect to the Asset firing the Trigger.

Tick the box if the error is to be treated as Fatal, i.e. Stops the script execution.
NOTE :By Default the error will be treated as E_USER_WARNING which means the eror will be lodged but the scrit execution will continue
If the specified field is non-empty in the SOAP respose, the step action will treat it as a regular error.
